results.title: Abridge Headquarters Location & Office Address | SalesTools AI
results.content: ## Abridge Headquarters - Office Location & Address ## Abridge Headquarters Abridge is a leading AI company headquartered in Pittsburgh, PA. ## Headquarters Location The Abridge headquarters is strategically located in Pittsburgh, providing access to top talent, industry partners, and a thriving business ecosystem. Located at 2000 Technology Dr, Pittsburgh, PA 15219, the headquarters is easily accessible via multiple transportation options including public transit, parking facilities, and bike storage. As Abridge continues to expand its market presence, the Pittsburgh headquarters remains the foundation of global operations, designed to accommodate future growth and evolving needs. ### Ibeo Automotive Headquarters - Office Location & Address ### Hesai Technology Headquarters - Office Location & Address ### RoboSense Headquarters - Office Location & Address

results.title: Generative AI Platform for Clinical Conversations - Abridge
results.content: [READ PRESS RELEASE](/press-release/highmark-health-ahn-abridge-prior-authorization) Clinically useful and billable AI notes at the point of care, integrated directly into EHR workflows. Leading healthcare AI infrastructure, powering the most trusted billable, clinically useful, and compliant notes at the point of care. **Unlock contextually aware notes** with dynamically integrated data from previous patient encounters, health system-specific guidelines, and clinician preferences. Christus Health Decreases Cognitive Load by 78% with Abridge With Abridge Enterprise, healthcare systems get all the tools they need to easily manage security, compliance, and deployments—for all clinicians, in one place. ## Abridge in the Press Read More](/press-release/highmark-health-ahn-abridge-prior-authorization)[April 29, 2025 ### AltaMed Health Services Corporation Partners with Abridge to Bring Leading AI Technology to Multilingual Communities Read More](/press-release/altamed-abridge)[April 10, 2025 Read More](/press-release/sharp-abridge)

## Abridge Headquarters - Office Location & Address ## Abridge Headquarters Abridge is a leading AI company headquartered in Pittsburgh, PA. ## Headquarters Location The Abridge headquarters is strategically located in Pittsburgh, providing access to top talent, industry partners, and a thriving business ecosystem. Located at 2000 Technology Dr, Pittsburgh, PA 15219, the headquarters is easily accessible via multiple transportation options including public transit, parking facilities, and bike storage. As Abridge continues to expand its market presence, the Pittsburgh headquarters remains the foundation of global operations, designed to accommodate future growth and evolving needs. ### Ibeo Automotive Headquarters - Office Location & Address ### Hesai Technology Headquarters - Office Location & Address ### RoboSense Headquarters - Office Location & Address
